#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	string s;
	int mid;
	while(t)
	{
		cin>>s;
		mid=s.length()/2;
		for (int i=mid-1;i>=0;i--)
		{
			cout<<s[i];
		}
		for (int i=s.length()-1;i>=mid;i--)
		{
			cout<<s[i];
		}
		cout<<endl;
		t--;
	}
	return 0;
}
